title: "Auto-Magnetization Exercise: Steps and Preparation"
first_phrase: This text is a step-by-step guide to self-magnetization, which is an act of willpower. The last part focuses on the exercises to prepare and execute self-magnetization without the help of a book. The student is advised to read the chapter carefully and occasionally self-magnetize themselves under favorable conditions. The text provides an outline of 28 preparatory exercises that should become a part of life. The last part of the text consists of deep and light preparatory phases, including relaxation, thorough breathing, and the steps to create and absorb the self-magnetization formula.

last_phrase: In conclusion, practicing deep breathing techniques and self-magnetization can help you achieve a more relaxed and focused state of mind. Remember to start with the preparatory phase of muscle relaxation and full breathing before moving on to the deeper phases of self-affirmation and visualization. Allow yourself to fully absorb the formula and let your mind organize itself while you sleep, waking up refreshed and energized. Try incorporating these steps into your daily routine for a more balanced and centered approach to life.
